title: Sincere Garden
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu only in Japanese but very friendly staff who can (kind of) explain what's on the menu. Atmosphere relaxed. A healing/massage place is located on the first floor and cafe on the second floor. Very crowded at lunch time. Last order is taken at 7pm. May 2014, reported that restaurant uses honey and bonito flakes. Previously listed as vegan on HappyCow.
streetAddress: Tokyo, Minato-ku, 3-5-4 Kita Aoyama, Takano Building 2F
